scripts.dev:docs: bash setup/setup.sh python3 -m mkdocs serve -f docs/mkdocs.yml
scripts.build:docs: bash setup/setup.sh python3 -m mkdocs build -f docs/mkdocs.yml
scripts.build:docs:win: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File setup/setup.ps1 python -m mkdocs build -f docs/mkdocs.yml
scripts.build:all: npm run build:docs && npm run build:app && bash scripts/setup-app.sh
scripts.build:all:win: npm run build:docs:win && npm run build:app && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/setup-app.ps1
scripts.serve:docs: bash setup/setup.sh python3 -m mkdocs serve -f docs/mkdocs.yml
scripts.serve:docs:win: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File setup/setup.ps1 python -m mkdocs serve -f docs/mkdocs.yml
